title: Concrete 9 by Yang Xueguo
author: Yang Xueguo
excerpt: Clarkesworld Science Fiction and Fantasy Magazine and Podcast. This page: Concrete 9 by Yang Xueguo
text:
Skip to content
Issue 77 – February 2013Cover ArtConcrete 9Yang Xueguo is a 36-year-old Chinese artist from Kunming, a small city in Yunnan, China. His passion for painting started at an early age and eventually led to a career as a university art teacher. His preferred mediums are 3D animation and digital painting.

 
 ISSN 1937-7843 · Clarkesworld Magazine © 2006-2022 Wyrm Publishing. Robot illustration by Serj Iulian.
